_sText:
Sliderace_499_long (EXTENDED)
_________________________

This is the second and long Public Version of the slidemap "sliderace_499"
I already uploaded another shorter Version of the map
_________________________

Specifications:
Players: 2-28
Slide-Duration: 40-50s 
(the map is now 10-15s longer :D)
Texture: Aim-Style

Special features:
- AFK-Protection (v.1.15)
- The Map automatically restict waepons (exept Knife)
- Ts and CTs slide separated to begin
- i worked much with lasers in the new part :)
_________________________

Good Luck and have Fun with the Map ;)
_________________________

by Curry
